It's a good puzzle game. you should buy this before buying Portal 2
one word to sum this game up: Perfect! (apart from trying to find out if the cake is a lie)

Good game with interesting and challenging story, albeit quite short. The game is great for it's puzzles so if you love spending a while thinking how you're going to get through one room then I'd recommend it. However some of the Bonus Challenges are a ridiculous and in some cases require a whole lot of luck.
you dont not need to be a smart person to play it gets harder and harder that what makes fun :)

It's like Skyrim with bad gameplay.

it is cake
muy buen juego tanto como el portal 2 un poco corto el juego pero desde luego no deja de ser muy bueno, salinendo de todos los demas juegos portal es un juego muy original, vale la pena comprarlo

Very quick game (about three hours give or take depending on your familiarity). Puzzles are fun to navigate and figure out. Story line is incredibly interesting and sets up for a great sequel. Easter eggs are cool and the achievements add to the experience of the game.
So good, a must play and were's portal 3 Newell tell us!

good statagy game
!

When I first played this, totally blind to any spoilers, I became trapped in the awesome story this game has. Valve did a great job of making the history at aperture just subtle enough to make you keep wanting more. The puzzles are very good in that their difficulty progression increases linearly through levels. This is one of those games that you should definitely play if you like the puzzle genre.

WOOOOOOW no wonder this is the game of the year!

Great game good levels amazing platform sticky situations

and i will say its for the more hardcore gamers!                 If you have some extra bucks pick it up right away.
Very fun game.

This game is a classic. Take physics and Sci-Fi and this is basically what you get. I absolutely love the Portal series. Fun for any ages. Background storylines are amazing and really get you to think.
Quirky little puzzler with a dry sense of humor. 3/5 cakes.
Das Spiel ist voll geil und genial. Leider ist es zu schnell durchgespielt :(
EPIC!
Супер игра!!

Cosa di dire di portal?  Portal è un gioco davvero molto interessante, presenta una dinamica di gioco molto interessante per gli appassionati dei rompicapi platform, la pecca è la longevità ma per il resto è un titolo che vale la pena di esser comprato. Graficamente non ha grandi imperfezioni, lo stile e le ambientazioni sono ovviamente futuristiche e molto semplici tanto da non far stancare l'occhio (ma anche da non affascinarlo), come si può dedurre da questa recensione il suo punto forte verte sull'idea della creazione di portali (capitan ovvvio) per affrontare dei livelli che porteranno i giocatori all'avanzamento della trama.

Even though this game does not have the best graphics it is still awesome.With a strong story and even intergrating a boss fight into this first person puzzle game, and not to forget a song that realy gets you dancing, this game is, in my opinion, one of the best.

Pros
Great Gameplay
Doesn't overstay its welcome
Amazing Script
Good Humor

Cons
Too Dang Short!

Really though this is a great game and I highly recommend everyone to play it. Requires some quick aiming but for the most part only requires critical thinking. GLADos' lines are pure genius and I loved the humor.
Wonderful game. Innovative gameplay that really challenges the mind. A must play!

I would definitly recomend this game! Its great, and Ive had lots of fun with its confusing puzzles. Although its a short game, I still loved it from the start! I would also recommend Portal 2 as well, but only after you have finished this game first. Full 10-10!

One of my all-time favorite games, alongside Portal 2.
I've always liked puzzles, and this game includes puzzles that you will say are impossible until you figure it out.

Be prepared to have to think in order to solve the puzzles, but It's very worth it!

The only problem I have with it, is that while it claims "partial controller support", what it really means is: This game not only will not work with a PS3 controller, it also will recognize the controller just enough to prevent you from simply remapping the keys.

Yeah that's annoying.  But it's completely playable on a laptop with a touchpad.

Semplicemente uno dei Must have degli ultimi 10 anni!!! Ha portato una ventata d'aria fresca e di novità al mercato dei giochi piattaforma...

Relativamente corto ma appassionante con un background narrativo magro ma eccezionale al contempo...
Suggestivo, intrigante,...!!! 9.5/10
Speedy things goes in, speedy thing comes out.
Jedna z nejlepsich her herni komunity. Doporucuji

This game is Funny, and awesome. You have to do challenges that challenge the brain and it has a surprising ending. It is so funny hearing the sentry's and all the jokes as you beat them up using portals and stuff. The only thing that stinks is that it is so short.
Franchement, la seul chose à dire c'est "The cake is not a lie !"
fun game
very nice
Played as soon as it was released and loved it straight away. The CAKE is not a lie :-P

Ich dachte, nee ich dencke das Portal das Beste Spiel ist das es je gab! Wenn Sie's nicht gespielt haben dann kaufen Sie sich "Portal Bundel" weil Portal 2, auch eine ziemlich interrresante geschichte hatt...

10/10
El mejor juego te lleva a una aventura divertida vastante interesante te rompe la cabeza LITERAL
Não precisa nem de comentário, apenas jogue e descubra o quanto esse jogo é bom.
Buy it.
This game simply put, is [b]amazing[b]! I love the story, the characters, and overall the entire game. It's well-written, designed. Valve did a great job.
If you haven't played this masterpiece, what the hell are you waiting for? You'll become smarter just by playing it. Stop looking at this review and go buy it right now. Seriously.

If you haven't played this game yet, you're missing out. Great experience, clever and funny dialogue, and a couple of challenging puzzles. The only downside is that it's a very short game, and could be finished within 3 to 4 hours.

Still good tho.

I love this game 'i had to have beat it 5 times by now. It's really fun especially the community made maps. 
This game is just  a great game

Portal was originally a sort of beta-test concept for VALVe's Orange Box. Even so, it is a very great game. The environment of the game as you make your way through each level is downright creepy,  and the constant commentary of your invisible overseer only adds to this. Portal is a great game whether you play it before or after Portal 2, and I highly recommend both to anyone.
This is a cute game with some great puzzles and creepy story. GLaDos is awesome. The song at the end is worth the time it takes to finish the game!
Primo capitolo, stranamente più pesante del secondo, gameplay divertente ma molto corto (2 ore circa). Secondo me è possibile puntare direttamente al seguito (Portal 2) senza problemi.
A great experience for those wanting a challenge. Texting your brain, making you believe that you are competing for your life on the line. Awesome game to fill in the Half-Life saga.
relaxing, not hard mind joy for a few hours with interesting level design and gameplay features from Narbacular Drop.
Kleines nettes denkspiel ;)

This is the first of an amazing series. Set in the universe of the Half Life series, it is the more strategy and thinking side of Valve. Amazing game if you like puzzles and 1st person shooters in one.
Fun and mentally challenging
Its an OK game, Portal 2 is much better. If you are looking to get into Potal, I recommend getting the bundle as Portal 2 has a much better plot showing more of the bowels of Aperture.

é um jogo curto porém cada segundo e centavo gasto compensa.
portal é um jogo que deveria ter uma dlc que testa seu Q.I. pois eu considero que é um jogo que gasta sua inteligencia.
this is a really good puzzle game. took me one hour to beat though
Excellent setting, hilarious screenplay and a stunning gameplay. The only bad thing is that is too small. Must play.
The second best story of all games, with the best being Portal 2. the gameplay is also incredible and this game is a must play!
I like falling continuously between parallel portals

Portal is an Amazing game made by Valve the makers of the best PC games on the market. This puzzle god is a brilliant game for both puzzle novices and puzzle professionals as in my opinion the game its self is not hard but the challenges after you beat the story take time to master even for the most skilled puzzle game masters. To me the best aspect about the game itself is the story. The rich backstory and deep linear narrative makes your progression worth something better by the time you reach the climax of the game and you get cake....who doesn't want cake. The focus on your character and why she is in aperture science labs in the first place is a dark subject yet the humour created in the game makes this game lighter, comic and satisfying for the audience. It’s a pretty faultless game and for its original output (orange box) Portal has since jumped from indie creation to full brown Puzzle genre god. 10/10 Buy this game, feel immersed and get cake...seriously buy this game for the cake!
名作名作アンド名作
A must have !
One of the best games i ever played.
GREAT game! It was short lived though. It was worth buying. My brain hurts now. It took me 112 minutes to beat the game. Time to play portal 2

I recently purchsed this through Steam, having played it previously on disc format. It is a fantastic new take on the FPS genre. The only downside is that it's short. But, it was never intended to be a full-script game, more of an experiment; an experiment that turned out very well.
Quite possibly THE most clever game I've played on Steam/Xbox 360.  Just get it and play it, if you haven't already; or else you are missing out on one of the greatest games of all time.
Fantastisk! Nesten helt perfekt!

Ideas nuevas para un juego muy muy interesante. Lo mejor para mi es lo poco que dura (y no estoy hablando con ironia) el hecho de poder pasartelo en un par de dias hace que no te aburras de el. 
Cuesta pillarle el truco a los portales pero cuando empeizas a entenderlos los niveles se van complicando asi que no da tiempo a aburrirte.

En rebajas de steam vale la pena probarlo.
This game FUCKS WITH MY HEAD omg
Un juego maravilloso, nunca te cansas de jugarlo, una historia perfecta muy atrapante y muy entretenida
Классика. Шикарно.

Читал тут, что сначало лучше пройти первую часть этой серии. Полностью согласен! После прохождения первой части не пришлось осваиваться заного во второй и в сюжет вникал лучше! Конечно же игра сделана круто, пусть сюжет и короткий, да и игра проходится быстро, но это того стоит! Очень интересно и занимательно проходить!
Суперска игра! Очень понравились задумка и сюжет. Valve красавцы! Рекомендую.

Portal is a game, which shouldn't work if you think about it: a FPS precision platform puzzle game, with puzzle taking the identity of it. But it's not overstayed, it’s as long as it has to be. The humour is dark, which really makes the game complete in the end. If you never saw a video of a playthrough or never tried it, you will enjoy the experience and finally flex your cognitive skills.
絶対ハマる新感覚神ゲー
This game is amazing from start to finish. It is also very short. I'd say buy it anyway, but if you're very picky about quantity of conent, maybe wait until it's on sale or something.

Portal is a really good looking game. Its fun , its strategic , and AWESOME! You sould get this. Sometimes its challenging , but the gameplay otherwise is really good. It can be funny by creating portals above and below you , and what Glados (A robotic guide) says.

Fun puzzle game. While it doesnt have a long campaign (and even about half of it is basically a tutorial, learning mechanics), it does have fun moments and some difficult puzzles. Murderous AI named GLaDOS is very interesting enemy as well. Plus it has decent credits.
Overall, it can be considered too easy and short, but still game worth playing. I personally prefer Portal 2 over it, though playing this gives good insight to story

IT IZ A GREAT PUZZLE GAME! If you can play this, you can play it in an hour or 2. I loved this, and beat it twice. Don't let the 7 hours on record fool you, it is a great game, and I haven't even tried the advanced challenges yet. Also, if you are patient, I got this and Portal 2 in a bundle during the Steam Christmas sale for $5. I love this game, and recomend it to anyone that likes games. This was the first PC game I have ever played, and I got it cheap. I love it and highly recomend it.
One of the best most innovative games ever.

93 out of 100

First, let me see that this game is AWESOME! It was completely unlike anything I've ever played before. The story was great but it could have been a bit longer. But if you want to play more there's always Portal 2, and eventually Portal 3 (I hope).
Portal - un joc care dezvolta foarte mult logica. Merita toti banii.
더 이상의 무슨 설명이 필요한지 모르겠군요. 밸브가 만든 포탈이라는 것 만으로도 가치를 증명하기는 충분한데.

GLaDOS, oh, GLaDOS. You bring so much fun into a game. While there are some people who might not like Portal, I'm one of the many who love it.

I don't think there is much I can say about the game that many do not already know. It's a very intriguing puzzle/"shooter" that was pretty freaking original when it came out. It can be a little confusing if you're not able to wrap your head around the puzzles, but most people shouldn't have many issues. I've played the game many times over (not all on Steam) and have enjoyed it every single time.

Many years from now, it'll be still alive... Yeah, I know.
Jogo muito criativo, vale muito apena a compra
Great/...........\game

It's an old game now but I still find the levels challenging and fun

One of the best games I have ever played. Great tutorial, challenging puzzles that feel rewarding once completed, and amazing graphics, considering this was made in 2007. If you for some reason havenot already bought the Orange box, it will be the most worthwhile $20 you will ever spend.
10/10

great game only wouldnt recommend it if u have pc worse than a mac because low fps can screw u up badly

Puzzle game decisamente simpatico con una storia coinvolgente.
L'idea del gioco base è davvero unica. Portali per spostarsi nelle 3 dimensioni secondo non si sa quale principio fisico.
Sono disposto ad accettare il nonsense fisico, è un ottimo gioco.
La valve ci mette decisamente il suo zampino con easter egg / indizi simpatici.

Garantisce un bel po' di ore di gioco e ha un seguito spettacolare.
Sicuramente un must al tempo e anche ora.
